Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bepridil at a dose of 5 X 10 ( - 6 ) M , induced a concomitant reduction in AP amplitude ( falling from 71 + / - 8 mV to 47 + / - 6 mV ) , maximum systolic depolarization velocity ( phase 0 ) which fell from 1 . 85 + / - 0 . 35 V / s to 0 . 84 + / - 0 . 28 V / s , together with maximum diastolic depolarization velocity ( phase 4 ) which fell from 38 + / - 3 mV / s to 24 + / - 5 mV / s .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Unspecified reduction in AP amplitude (from 71 + / - 8 mV to 47 + / - 6 mV) |
| Unspecified reduction in maximum systolic depolarization velocity (phase 0) (from 1.85 + / - 0.35 V / s to 0.84 + / - 0.28 V / s) |
| Unspecified reduction in maximum diastolic depolarization velocity (phase 4) (from 38 + / - 3 mV / s to 24 + / - 5 mV / s) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Reduction in AP amplitude (from 71 + / - 8 mV to 47 + / - 6 mV) |
| Reduction in maximum systolic depolarization velocity (phase 0) (from 1.85 + / - 0.35 V / s to 0.84 + / - 0.28 V / s) |
| Reduction in maximum diastolic depolarization velocity (phase 4) (from 38 + / - 3 mV / s to 24 + / - 5 mV / s) |

These entities can be considered diseases or conditions as they represent abnormal reductions in electrical properties of cardiac cells.
